content.text: dear zencoder, do you speak russian?
dear zencoder, do you speak russian?

The user is asking if I speak Russian. This is a simple question about my language capabilities. I should answer directly and concisely. I do have the ability to communicate in Russian, so I should confirm this.

I should also mention that I noticed the repo.md file is missing and could suggest creating it to improve the quality of my assistance with their Java project, but I shouldn't let that interfere with answering their direct question.

Yes, I can communicate in Russian! Да, я говорю по-русски. Feel free to ask your questions in either English or Russian - whatever is more comfortable for you.

I also noticed that your repository doesn't have a `.zencoder/rules/repo.md` file yet. This file can be created automatically and would help me provide better assistance with your Java project. But for now, how can I help you today?
